title: Loan & Bond Management System
overview: A centralized Loan and Bond Management System built to manage the complete lifecycle of loans and bonds, automate repayment schedules, and integrate accounting and external financial platforms.
problemStatement: The organization relied on multiple independent systems for loan origination, accounting, and investment tracking. Repayment schedules and accounting entries were handled manually, leading to operational inefficiencies and data inconsistencies.
solution: Implemented a centralized Loan and Bond Management System using Apache Fineract as the core engine. The system automated repayment schedules, generated accounting entries, and synchronized data with external systems using APIs and scheduled jobs.
keyFeatures: Support for bond sale and payout events
Integration with external systems using REST APIs
responsibilities: Configured and deployed Apache Fineract (UI and backend)
Developed and customized a bond management module
Customized core Fineract logic based on business requirements
Implemented bond sale logic with repayment schedule recalculation
Customized repayment schedule behavior beyond default Fineract capabilities
Enhanced and fixed issues in existing loan management modules
Customized charges and fee handling logic

architecture.description: The system integrates a Loan Origination System, a centralized Loan Management System, and an Accounting system through REST APIs and scheduled jobs.

impact: Eliminated manual repayment and accounting processes
Reduced operational errors and data inconsistencies
Improved system reliability and financial accuracy
Enabled real-time visibility into loan and bond data
